column1: 1. What was the Age of Exploration?
column2: In the 1400s-1700s, Europeans explored and colonized much of the world.

column1: 2. Who was Prince Henry the Navigator?
column2: This Portuguese Prince sponsored Europeans to explore and map the world.
Bartholomew Diaz was the first to sail around the southern tip of Africa.
Vasco de Gama was the first to sail to India and back to Portugal.
Christopher Columbus was an Italian explorer who discovered America for Spain.
The Reconquista was a war where Christian Spaniards reconquered their country from the Muslim Moors (c. 700 – 1492).

column1: 7. What is another name for American Indians?
column2: American Indians are also known as Native Americans.
Polygamy is the practice of having more than one wife at the same time.
Columbus Day is a federal holiday set aside to honor Columbus’ discovery of America.
